backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing logo fix, fallback UI, and SEO image path features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and recent branding/SEO updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with favicon, SEO meta tags, and corrected OG/Twitter image paths.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with layout and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Brand logo component with size options and error fallback to text-based mark.
frontend/src/components/LogoMotif.tsx: Decorative low-opacity logo motif with fallback to text if the image fails.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper providing consistent spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/Seo.tsx: Dynamically updates document title and meta tags including OG fields.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and social icons using BrandLogo.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation links, CTAs, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining typography, theming variables, and dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports centralized paths for logo, favicon, and hero images.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page describing the restaurant’s story, values, and global cuisine focus with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing location, phone, hours, quick actions, and a map layout.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery page with tabbed categories and modal image previews using a static list of images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero, cuisine highlights, and action buttons for booking or ordering, using brand assets and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows menu categories with descriptions and items, plus a hero section and a button to download the full menu PDF.
frontend/src/pages/OffersPage.tsx: Lists promotional offers with styled cards and a hero section, including terms and conditions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, shadows, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, and feature requirements focused on fixing missing logo assets and ensuring consistent branding.
